title: [Medicine] New study suggests that SARS-CoV-2 infection is associated with increased risk of Guillain-Barr√© syndrome (GBS), a condition in which the immune system attacks the nerves, while Pfizer-BioNTech mRNA COVID-19 vaccine is associated with decreased risk of GBS
